divs: Sighting DetailsNewport's been a hot spot for awhile now I've got rods, rectangles, semi cloaked UFO in InfraRed and day time all video shot from my deck same camera zoom lens and fitted for day time infrared. One thing I do know when the birds are thick ufos show up what better creature to use for remote viewing. Make sure you follow the whole story!
